Written from the life experiences of Channing Tatum, who worked as a stripper when she was 19, the plot explores the friendships in the world of male dancers.

"Magic" Mike (Tatum, GI Joe) teaches a young dancer, the "Boy" (Alex Pettyfer in "I Am Number 4", to behave on and off the stage, in a summer full of festivals and women.

Matthew McConaughey (of Eastbound & Down) lives the owner of the club where they perform and Matt Bomer (from White Collar) and Joe Manganiello (True Blood) are also strippers in the house.
